participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Ambitious and determined, often feeling misunderstood by her family.
participant_1.background: my dream car is a rolls royce ghost. i like shopping. my family doesn't support my career choices. i currently work for a watch dealer.

participant_2.name: Raj
participant_2.personality: Creative and independent, enjoys blending traditional values with modern ideals.
participant_2.background: my favorite music genre is death metal. my family and i are from india. i'm studying to be a computer programmer. i am a swim coach at my local pool. my mother is very traditional while i prefer to be more free spirited.
